items.description: The north Norfolk coast from Old Hunstanton, to and including Cley
items.message: Levels are now below the flood risk thresholds. The forecast is for no current flood risk from high tides. There may still be some areas where flood water is present until it can naturally drain away. Continue to take care on waterside roads and footpaths, and don't put yourself in unnecessary danger. We will continue to monitor levels closely and re-issue alert messages as required.
